text: Thomas Bilson (1655–1692) was an MP for Petersfield during the late 17th century.History of Parliament On-line Bilson's father Leonard had been the town's MP from 1667 to 1681. He was admitted to Lincoln's Inn in 1673. In 1678 he married Susannah née Legg.'One hundred years of a pocket borough: Petersfield and Parliament, 1685-1783' Surry, N. p8: Petersfield; Petersfield Area Historical Society (Paper No. 7); 1983 ==References== Category:People from Hampshire Category:17th-century English people Category:English MPs 1685–1687 Category:English MPs 1689–1690 Category:1655 births Category:1692 deaths
title: Thomas Bilson (died 1692)
